lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, and welcome to Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much to our production team and Marisha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not until-- and I'm sure some of you can speak to this, too-- it's not until this is taken from you that you realize how important of a rock it is in your weekly life, let alone daily life and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs) I'm so happy to be back here with you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll begin-- Sam, you had something you wanted to mention.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But in case you forget, you can always ask, is it Thursday yet? Cheers!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You made the wizard cry before the game started.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And finding a rhyme with "pernicious," no less.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, who are you talking to? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll admit that rhyme, it made me suspicious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marisha, you had some things you wanted to talk about.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Caleb) How did you accomplish this great feat? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The magic of scrying stones has gotten (clicks) top notch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That means that things are better and better, right? That's how things have been going.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 2020 might have something to say about that (laughs).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're doing your Narrative Telephone, and it's next.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's also in the future and in the past.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And speaking of Narrative Taliesin, Taliesin, Liam, you guys wanted to talk a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got a lot of interesting narrative stuff, and I'm really excited for you all to see what we put together.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to just gush and show a couple of like, uh--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also flagged this one, with this great Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is done by Azra or Azra, @Azraillu, I don't know how to pronounce that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It only exists in this book, and it's gorgeous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone looks sad, because something bad happened just moments before this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just sent you guys a picture of one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That spell scroll, because Taliesin is an insane person, not only does it have a bunch of Easter eggs in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's functional, in as much a spell scroll can be functional in its design.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should say this was also helped designed by Aaron Monroy, who works at the company.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He does such amazing work, so yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll talk about that another time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and, Ashley, I believe you're up last.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Don't forget to love each other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And since I believe that concludes our announcements--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we talk about something else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it's time to jump into tonight's episode of-- (squealing and nervous noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you guys watch Tiger King?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't even say any weird things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had began traveling southwest, beneath the island of Urukayxl, where you once fought your way into an ancient temple and unlocked one of the various seals of Uk'otoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appeared to be a landmass of some kind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, in fact, it seemed to be gaining--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instead, this was a massive creature, beneath the waves, a domed-shell, covered in spikes--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you are all gathering now, looking off of the stern of the ship, you notice this massive entity is careening towards you and, I'd say, at this point, it's about 200 or so feet out, and it is rapidly gaining.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see any land anywhere, any horizon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make off, in the distance from where you had been, elements of, well, you wouldn't be able to see it so much, from this distance, but you know you're far past the Inkclaw Reef, and that's the closest landmass that you've been near, and Urukayxl itself.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And can we currently tell if we are sailing with the wind, against the wind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it is not helping you or harming you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Captain, do you have any experience with this sort of thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Has Fjord got any experience with dragon turtles? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! Up to this point, dragon turtles were just a spooky ghost story that drunken sailors would tell in taverns, or they would tell sailors that were new to the shipping industry, just to spook them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would Jester have heard any of these ghost stories?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I roll poorly, we're all going to die, tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) This is history? I mean, I have shit history, but I rolled an 11, so it's 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But in the same context, they're just known to destroy ships and carry their contents down beneath the waves, supposedly probably dragging what remnants within, onward to where they call their home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're big pirate turtles, pirate dragon turtles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you cast Water Breathing this morning?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 2:30, every day, while we're on the water.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, cool, cool, cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So we can all breathe underwater.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can take this moment-- what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we should use that in, like, an emergency situation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a moment to just cast Water Walk on everybody, except Nott and plus Orly and three other crew members, whoever's around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean "Water Walk"? Like, we literally walk on the water?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, you'll hit it like ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if you want to swim? Can you choose to swim if you water walk?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you want to swim?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, our speed on the water is the same as if we were on solid ground?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait, I'm going to-- I'm going to use Divine Intervention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to use Divine Intervention?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you are trying to roll a 12 or under.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need the Traveler drop kicking out of the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which one is the first? Oh, okay, the percentile is the first number?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the first number, the first digit, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should set full speed ahead and try and go as fast as possible to give ourselves time to prepare for this, any way we can, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the direct order, Captain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I'll roll a d6 and multiply the result by five, and we'll apply that bonus to the ship speed, which is a flat, because we're not with or against the wind, 35 feet per turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to bust out the fan, the wind Mortal Kombat fan, and give us a nice burst of wind--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you, (whooshes) and create that one column of wind blasting into the back of the sail, it manages to give it a little bit of a push, a magical nudge, if you will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was a six times five, which is 30, so 65 feet is our speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But between that and with Beau's helping, it does gain a little bit of speed. Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a question. How big is this turtle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're guessing it's somewhere in the neighborhood of about 40-ish feet, from side to side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big is our ship from side to side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it is wider than your ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And as long as half of our ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take this opportunity to just sort of, eh, let's cast Whirlpool right on that bugger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I know, what's the range on it, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, you can definitely catch it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a "what you make of it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to slow him down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, Whirlpool, what level spell is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the only way you can swim away is by making a strength check against my spell DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the benefits you guys are doing, you actually prevent it from gaining on you, this round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It also has to make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that's a-- I'm not joking, a natural 20.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's just to not take bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so it doesn't take any bludgeoning damage, and is it's a strength check to try and escape from it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It isn't caught, but it's still in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 26 is what it rolls, so I'm pretty sure it breaks out of the whirlpool.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not out of it, depending on its speed, it's not out of it yet, because it has to be--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It got pulled 10 feet towards it, and at its speed, going full speed towards you, it does manage to make its way out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just eyeballing it, it's traveling about 80 feet a round.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're about five feet per turn faster than it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say it's still on the cusp of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next round, I'll make another check for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know it ain't going to work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So I would like you to roll initiative for the ship, if you don't mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, not a problem, not a problem, not a problem.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's the dexterity modifier of the ship plus your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ship's crew quality bonus, which is five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your dex modifier is, for the ship, the dex is four. The modifier is minus three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fucking balls, right, so that would be only a two, so 15.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does that mean? The higher dex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say roll one more time to see just who nudges out on this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are just barely ahead of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is how we will be able to fire a cannon each action, but only two of our four cannons per side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a lot of math.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we have that many people on the ship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have four people doing full speed ahead, right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here, to help me with my cannonry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'd have to do it, each turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you need those four people to do it, each turn, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You also have Gallan, Orly, Shelda, and Marius.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So I think we need to fight from that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "If you're cool with it?" You're the captain. Tell us what to do!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, this is me, Travis, talking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to go down fighting!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the rough distance, did we say, between us and it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But can the cannons do more damage than spells against him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It can do 8d10 bludgeoning damage, if it hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, how many cannons are on this side?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe I'll make you roll for the cannon fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To shoot a cannon every round, it needs three people manning it, because one person to load, one person to aim, and one person to actually fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many cannons do we have?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have four on each side, but we can only operate two per round, and I figure, because we used Control Water, the last time we had a chance to engage, and we haven't really don't it, let's just fucking try it, and if it starts to go shitty, then we can break up and go individually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, as a note too, to fire cannons from the side of the ship, when you're going forward, you have to turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So just make sure you're aware of that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They don't come out, and automatically (whirring)? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain, should I Pack the Good Powder?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not yet, because you have to be really, really close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's very, it's sort of turning me on, a little bit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's just all urine, below this table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was just complimenting the captain, ooh! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's why we bought the round for, so you'll have time to move to the cannons, three per cannon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I take the crew, or do you need them to do full speed ahead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can take all four of the crew, and it's just the First Mate and I are going to stay out here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're sending the crew down into the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if he eats the side of the boat, and we're all underwater? Oh, good thing we can breathe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as well as Veth is heading down into the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Yasha's going down, as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are the rest of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we help with the cannons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or should we be on the deck?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If the First Mate would stay at the bridge that goes down to the galley, just so I have eyesight with you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: -- and I'll stay at the helm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then me and you, Caleb, can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you at the helm? All right, cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay near the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you turning so much?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't this how you drive in the movies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're at the side of the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, the turtle's behind you guys, like back this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then leaning out over the side, looking back--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys look off this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Caduceus, you would've been up here, when you first noticed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So do you want to move back down to the side, or do you want to stay up here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll stay up there, for now, and keep an eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'll be on the opposite side of Caleb, just to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beau, after this round of attacks, you'll move down to the cannon, and we'll do a Fire at Will.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he has to be close.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be on the other side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Jester is on this side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain, which side of the cannonry should we prepare, the starboard or port? Captain!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He peeks at his cheat sheet, in the back of his flask.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just whatever brings it to the wind, I suppose would be the way to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so everyone gets to their places.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And actually, if I'm reading this right, Fire at Will grants advantage on the next attack roll, not this one, right, because we have to get into place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, Beau, let's go ahead and Fire at Will--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he'll close within that-- I think, he'll close within that 120-foot distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, bitches! Man your cannons!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The first mate will be joining the first of the two cannons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sides of the wake, the water itself, is now starting to (hisses) spray up at the sides of its shell, as it seems to be rising up more and more, and you're getting a better view of just the intense mass of this creature, but it just takes its turn, just careening towards you, double move, and it's gaining.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're able to move that round--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Second action is the turn. So we're starting to turn towards starboard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And we'll shift it like this, because it's fun to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) And that brings you to, not a stop, but you guys coast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So with the speed of it, per round, is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No wind, right? Turning doesn't put us in one or the other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turning this direction, if you're going to this side--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit, I should've checked which way the wind was fucking--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're not the navigator. Orly is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but it puts you in the direction of the wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's not coming against you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I meant to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got lucky, for not checking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When it moves on its turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it does manage to escape from it, but you did slow it a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that brings it to 135 feet from you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back to your turn now, the ship's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So 135 feet, it's just without our--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we perfectly perpendicular to it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are? Fucking light it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you allowed to cast spells?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that in just a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion) The cannons come flying back about 10 or so feet from the blast impact of it, and Yasha, make a strength check, if you want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you want to try and keep it at bay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe if you'd let it go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're, actually, heels digging about three inches into the wood, as it's splintering behind you, and you stop--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- in your tracks and push it right back to the entrance of the gun port.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The second one's a straight roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one of you is taking advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bonus to this is plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So plus six to the roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch it actually overshoot the creature and then vanish (splashes) into the ocean behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you do notice that you Yasha's does (explosion) impact and explode across the outside of his shell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go ahead and roll damage on that one, which is--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to ride or die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I haven't rolled a 10 in a minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh, of course! Fucking-- you don't need my permission.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) P to RL! Is that a real thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chain of command, chain of command!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And do it better this time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's the two attack actions that turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your ship is now perpendicular, and while the wind is going with it, it's only trailing at 50 miles per hour in that direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to take an 80-foot movement action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but I wanted to cast a spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally, it's, like, ship combat goes back and forth between things, but because we have casters on board, what do you guys want to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the distance, roughly, right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, it's about 135 feet, if you're taking your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wanted to cast-- after seeing Caduceus do it, I wanted to cast a Whirlpool, in front of the turtle as well, to keep it from ramming the boat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it is a strength saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Fjord, should I Pack the Good Powder?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we roll a one or two--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it doesn't take any bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it does pull him 10 feet towards it, which will slow its advancement by 10 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it has to make a check to try and escape it, next round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've already blasted, right, with cannons? Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That lowers its movement there by 10, and what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We shot it with a cannon, right? Okay, (claps) oh fuck it! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and do damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think. I mean, we're in the water, so--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It'll be dead before it gets to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fireball blasts on its shell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seems to not have as much impact as you had hoped.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the dark burn mark on it, the shell beneath it is pretty solid and holding in place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it have to make a save to get out of the whirlpool?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it has to do that next round.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But if it starts its turn in the whirlpool, it has to make that save as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: My brain is not used to math.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gets within 65 feet of the ship, which now means you can see it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's like Squirt from Finding Nemo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can now see it currently coming towards the ship, and as it's coming to this level, you see it beginning to submerge beneath the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can dragon turtles, can they talk? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hasn't had a chance to converse yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it is now going beneath the water.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I say, old chap, would you stop firing at me? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did seem angry, though, when he came up and out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was his face. He had a real--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The actual-- its shell is now below the water, and you can see the water bubbling up over it from the displacement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would I know, from my years of sailing, if 10 feet of water does anything to a cannonball fired into it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No Fire at Will, because you have to do it on the previous turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Loading the cannons back up, both of you guys take shots with disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's because he's under the water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about 10 feet below the surface.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of the cannons fire off and, boom, boom, big sprays into the ocean, but no impact on the target.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was an awesome splash, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uh-oh! This is going to go real bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe it was a good distraction.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know they have their turns, but just so people are aware of the shit above their heads.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it within 60 feet, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is about 80 feet from you.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it would just keep us from being able to do something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This thing isn't in shape to fight, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we do find sight on the dragon turtle again, I want you to steer the ship, and I'll make myself available for magics.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, whatever you need, Captain.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, is this a new day, by the way? Oh, and that's not an answer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you steered the ship before?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I still have, I still have my 5th-level Commune, don't I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to, like, shadow me for a little bit here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you would have another Commune.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, and then I'm going to burn one more Commune.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So either fight it or get to land.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it can go on land, too, but.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, it's a turtle, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the same day, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, same day? So this is my second 5th-level, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So all things-- as things stand--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hadn't thought about that part.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Will we come in contact with this turtle dragon in the next day, in the next 24 hours?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can sense, along with the Wild Mother's guidance and her connection with all things within the ocean, that while this entity trudges forward, it doesn't trudge directly on the right course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All things-- All things as they stand-- two days?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that it-- it's not scent more than that it has a way of following, to an extent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It can feel the disturbance in the water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah, so from what I took from that, and sorry, just communication's weird, because the set's weird, the next 24 hours, it's probably not going to make it's way to it, to us, all things being equal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel pretty confident that it's not going to happen, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to have to fight this guy on our way out of Rumblecusp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to build a community on Rumblecusp and live there for the rest of our lives.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or at least we'll save the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we leave Rumblecusp, we'll send all the followers out, before us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good thinking, and that way--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- we don't have to deal with them anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn four, if you've got six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: ♪ A little la, dee, dooh-dee, dah, lee ♪ But if he's not going to reach us within 24 hours, what difference does it make?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to sign a release form, if you want to travel on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or at least, I'll burn three, at the very least.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So burn three? All right, you'll get there a few hours early then.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if Beau's going to do her fan thing--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, it's a new day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does a little gust of wind for a hot second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And the percentage to see if it destroys itself is if you do it multiple times in the same day, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm only doing it once a day, because I don't want to risk it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there before you, you see, approaching quickly--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. You made it to break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never been so excited for a break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can look beneath the water and see there are sand banks that wind out beyond the beach, that look like these white tendrils beneath the ocean, and you're a few hundred feet back from the actual island itself, before you probably have to drop anchor and then go out on a small skiff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any other boats?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around the vicinity, you do not see any boats.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're the first ones here, you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone on the beaches? Anything that we can see, structures, people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Isn't it in, like, a couple of days?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, you don't want to be early.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but it's a long journey for many people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, it does give us a little time to set up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have roughly a week or so, or just under a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll look at the specifics, but yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can set up bathrooms and things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some tents, make them some sandwiches.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have our pick of the Fyre Fest tents.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And make some booths, so people can get their badges upon arrival.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we need to bring anything from the boat ashore with us? Gunpowder, are you going to make fluffernutters, in case of emergency?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is up to the mistress of ceremonies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I personally think we should take everything off the boat and bring it to shore, because I'm pretty sure the dragon turtle is going to come and destroy the boat, while we're here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a distinct possibility, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That would be a shame, to lose the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could run it-- So there are reefs about 200 yards outside of where the actual shoreline is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not reefs so much as they're sand banks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sand banks, right, and there's no way inside of those, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can get as close as you can, but you're still going to be probably about 100 and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, we can try and run the ship slightly aground, but it's so, eww!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should just leave our shit on the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, what would we take from here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lots and lots of little dick statues.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I could get us all off of this island, easily, but we would lose the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we don't need the cannons or the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, right, I mean, I think they all come with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him, Marius, like, raising his, like, "What?" And Orly goes, "No, no." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, let's prepare to exit the ship, and how many tenders do we have on this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can all walk on water, can't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But there won't be anybody to bring it back to shore, which means it'll have to reside on the beach.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am worried about Orly and the rest of them being on a ship, out here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perhaps they should camp off the ship then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So maybe two trips, and we'll bring seven ashore, and then someone will go back and bring the other four crew members.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's enough, but it's not a massive swathe of land.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Traveler, are you here? Hello, we're here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check, if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though, as you are shouting, you watch as some of the trees rustle a bit, and (flapping) a cluster of jungle birds escape from the nearby canopy and just coast around and out of sight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think this island is safe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should do a sort of--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need to scout the island to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to scout the island.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: -- understand the lay of the land and what we can do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to set down a ritual to commune with the Traveler.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is your thing, though, not his.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While you're doing that, could we have one of you, that are able to change your form, perhaps to do a little aerial investigation of this side of the island, from the air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Want to make sure there's no fiends abound.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trees moving, clearings, things that can be spotted from about.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take the west side and do a little perimeter scout--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just go around the perimeter of the waterline?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just into the treeline where we are, and do a beach line and see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take some time to turn my cat into more of a bird of paradise and send him up--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's a plant and a bird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There are, like, several birds of paradises, but also, yeah, we're giving you shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They talk at the enchanted tiki room, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd probably make the bird, like I intended.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, bird of paradise, fair enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A beautifully colorful bird is now up in the air, 10 minutes later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can produce a colorless mana.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I will remove the shit from my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone going to turn-- so Frumpkin's going to be a bird and search around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go the opposite direction from Beau and just scout the other beach, the other way on the beach.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys are just keeping an eye out for anything out of the ordinary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Looking for any structures or anything weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Perception check, each of you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's only a minute casting time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Took me a minute to get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From a natural weather standpoint, that does not quite--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, after you've gotten to land and situated yourself, you're pushing noon, because you did make a little time from the Control Waters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ritual takes a minute to cast, so it's super quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I did it as a ritual, so it's a 10-minute--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, can it be done? Yes, it can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those little statues with little drawings in the sand, around me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you do your little sketches and prepare yourself, as everyone wanders off to find their places, you concentrate and think real hard about the Traveler, and after a moment, you feel the hands on the shoulders and leaning in over on of you, he goes, "Yes, Jester, may I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have a place picked out for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're here, aren't we?" That's your first question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything dangerous on the island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What island would it be "if there wasn't anything dangerous on it? "Of course, there is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Third question, yes or no, am I still your favorite?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not even a question, my dear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, good. We saw a dragon turtle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's still tracking us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshes) And he vanishes into the wind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is anybody around? Where is everyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Perception check from Frumpkin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, actually, Frumpkin's had a good couple of rolls recently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do see, however, a clearing, a little further in, not quite at the base of the massive central volcano of Rumblecusp, where it gets its name, but on the path to that, on the southern side of the mountain.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we're currently on the eastern side of the mountain?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so after experiencing that for a while, I come out of it, and I find Jester and relate it all to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you want Frumpkin to see what the clearing's about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I want us to spend 30 or 40 minutes just watching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Frumpkin swoops in, the lingering mist gives way as he gets closer and closer, and where the mist begins to part, there, in this clearing, there is a village.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see elements of it that look like driftwood, elements that were carved from local trees, elements like pieces of ships that have been scavenged, and maybe, at this distant glance, what you peer through the mist, and you can only really see, like, the tops of the lower level of the village and a decent view of the ones that are higher up, amongst the trees, about maybe 50 or 60 feet off the ground, maybe a dozen or so humanoid figures, walking and traversing these bridges or within these small ramshackle buildings themselves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any kind of descriptive features to the humanoids that I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does Frumpkin want to get close enough to look?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Many of these figures-- it looks like a small commune.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's the garb, the weathered garb of the Menagerie Coast, augmented with what I would theorize can be found here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: People are just going about their lives here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can make out at this distance and with the mist still kind of obscuring the lower regions of this village.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a perception check for Frumpkin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One hit point, is at one hit point, right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a fissure of some kind where it is emerging from, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a zit that needs to be popped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I call Frumpkin back, and I snap out of it and just, we are not the only ones here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know the Traveler told me we have to fight something, probably.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. He said there's dangerous things here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I saw some sort of a village with folk who look like they are not-- possibly not from here, but living here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wonder if they have, like, a self-help group or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should round up the others, and, I mean, we need to throw a party here, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, did you see a good place to throw the party?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What part of the island and how far away was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we would have to travel up a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a number of miles to the northwest of the beach landing, you guys were at, so...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm painting Traveler Con 3000 on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to attach it to two big poles as a greeting banner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it'll take you a little while, but you begin the process of constructing that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make sure you poke holes in it, for air flow, the breeze--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a little half circle thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An important lesson on aerodynamics is absorbed by Jester, and in doing so, the sign is improved.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you were saying, Caleb, about people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I doubt what you have in mind would go unnoticed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we send a group to sort of negotiate and introduce, or should we all go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How hard is it to get to the people?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think it might take a day or so, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we should go together, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll say half a day, if not more, based on what gets in your way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look, a couple of people are out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was foggy, foggy day in the forest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many people are expected to come?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it was around 200? 20, maybe 20 people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he give you a number?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like he gave me a number a long time ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, somewhere around there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just so we know what kind of space--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Depending on how many people don't die on the way here from the dragon turtle attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, because the dragon turtle and what else?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The weather that was brewing off in one direction, that's not near us or moving towards us, the storm that was moving in--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Relatively clear, middle of the day?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe they have an inn or something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see a doorway to the volcano at all? Like, can we go in it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I though you would have gotten used to my accent by now, but a crack, a hole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, yeah, a fish area, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just take our half-day journey into the jungle and meet these people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should at least let them know that a lot of people could be on their way here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And unlike the turtle, maybe we don't throw fireballs or vortexes at them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or at least observe first, reconnaissance, and then we decide, yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If they look like they have a community, then I'm sure it'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This could be a good thing for the local economy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we can trade with them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe they've been looking for a way off the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They'll just kill us and take our ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, that would be an attempt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we have? Hang on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While we walk, what do we have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, in the interim, Orly and the rest of the crew set up there encampment on the beach there to help keep an eye on the ship, to also keep an eye for anybody who also is traveling inward, to the islands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you see a big dragon turtle coming to attack everything, play your bagpipes, okay, because they're really loud.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was better than your war horn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The air begins to slowly shift from the salty sea air into a sweet, earthy scent of lush vegetation, a damp ground, and, occasionally, you see little colorful flowers, orange and purple in color, that seem to be growing where the canopy begins to break up a bit, and a bit of light begins to make its way to the jungle floor.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not going to disturb you or anything, but yeah, if you got a thing, we'd appreciate if you didn't--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're just going to try and leave you to your thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caduceus, will you ask if it's okay if Yasha takes some flowers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can we kill some of you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I never thought about picking flowers as a bad thing, but when you talk to plants, it makes me feel a little funny.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, they grow back, so it's more of just--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aww, you're pulling their fingernails out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like picking fingernails off of somebody.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would it be all right if we just took one, just to remember you by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather the nearby trees and foliage heard you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Technically, it's like picking their genitals.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never thought of it that way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did not want to say it out loud, but it is a bit like pubic hair.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What on earth are you people talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Look, The Dwendalian public school system, unfortunately, was lost on--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a lot of sexual awareness--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to pick one of the flowers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one? There is an orange variety that are about that large or so, and there are a handful, you can see as you begin this travel, of purple, that are a little larger and anchored independently at the base of a few of these trees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The purple ones are really nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, I really wanted to go for a purple one, but that one feels like a-- I'm going to pick a purple one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to attempt to influence the flower not to do something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I have advantage on this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This group has been so horny for D&D, for three months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, right, and as you give it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You give it just a little tug.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: When I feel some resistance, I put another hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It usually takes a lot longer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you have this beautiful purple flower.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll mark the deflowering down in my book of many-- yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah, how does it smell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In fact, smelling very closely to it, I would like you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea this is happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You smell this very sweet, floral honey smell to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you immediately feel your mouth salivating, and your stomach begin to gurgle, and you compulsively find yourself-- and you all watch as Yasha begins to stuff this freshly-picked purple flower into her mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa! I'm going to try and-- oh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go and try and pull it out, she animalistically pulls away and continues to chew.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She just likes eating weird shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw for me, Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, you're just suffering indigestion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It has a little bit of spice to it, but the top note smelled like it was going to be a lot sweeter than it was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you recommend it? Is it worth it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think you should try it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are sweating a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think it's more prominent, because you're so pale.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it looks like a swelling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you manage to salvage any of the flower, or did you eat all of it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I had to consume the whole thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You had to eat that shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I go down and look at the stem of the flower? Is there any of that, like, you know how some flowers have white stuff that comes out of the stem when you pick it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I look and see if it has any of that white stuff coming out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm literally talking about, like, dandelions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the purple shaft have white stuff coming out of end of it? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is three months of pent-up frustration.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, but I want a flower for my book.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to grab the orange one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep it away from your face, Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is a flower for, if not to smell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To dry and put it in your book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or appreciate growing in the wild.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you pluck the orange one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't seem to react to the plucking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to press it into my book.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I'm going to close it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How is the general fog of the area, that we saw from outside the treeline?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It begins to really make things a little hard, beyond shapes and elements of light that do manage to come through, beneath the canopy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As a scientist, I'm going to take two clippings of two more of those purple flowers, just to take back with us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have purple flower clippings from Rumblecusp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doesn't fog normally burn off at a certain time of day? Or does this feel right to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The marine layer should've dissipated by this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, I appreciate that you're asking me that, but I think this may have been one of the first couple of islands I've ever been on, and we don't really have whatever marine layer--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if that affects things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do, like, a quick scan? Do I see any type of fissures leaking through the jungle or anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the sides of the volcano?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the mist have a scent?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I was going to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, if you're glancing around the vicinity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything that resembles that sort of a geothermal activity, as Fjord was saying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the mist have a scent or a taste, the air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The air still has that earthy combination of sweet decomposition meets wet dirt and earth, but nothing--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no sulfur in the mist?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it's real damn hot, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's helping cool the interior of the shaded canopy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I fire off a Divine Sense and just check 60 feet around us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course, we're just walking through the woods.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a sense, and you catch other members of your party occasionally quickly looking over their shoulders, and there's an element of feeling like you're being watched, but you see nothing watching you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just had to go say hi to these people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right, the people in the woods.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Of course not, no, I'm just-- I also know how we present, which is assholes, sometimes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long have we been traveling, at this point, towards this village?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have quite a ways of travel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we thought half a day to a whole day to get there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to leave a Traveler statue on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to leave a little trail of Traveler statues as we walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can I get a marching order as you guys continue to push further into the jungle, please?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll take the middle of the line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have Beauregard, along with, pardon me, along with Veth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be between Caleb and Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right now, I would be behind Fjord.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whichever is far enough away from Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so we'll put you at the back then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so we have Caduceus at the back, then Yasha, then Jester, Caleb, Fjord, Beau, and Veth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eyes of the Grave, for fun, just popping it on for a second.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Your eyes just went completely black.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) I don't know how I haven't noticed that before, but that's very cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You begin to notice signs of footprints in some of the lower troughs between the bases of these heavy, rooted trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are large and the gait seems to be multiple footprints in a walking pattern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just to see if you recognize--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tracks you see are not deep, and you can't quite make out what type of creature, but you assume, based on the faint claw marks and the lightness of their pressure, based on the size, that they're probably some sort of predatory creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little ways forward, you do see some humanoid footprints.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And because you're at the front, and you have a really high passive perception, you also notice, in one of the tree trunks, you can see some carvings to the right, as you push forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Using my background, do I recognize it as a cant of some sort or any type of, like, communication?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And because of your high passive investigation, you surmise that these are markings used by anyone who traverses these jungles, probably from the village that Caleb was mentioning, to ensure that if they ever get lost, it can guide them in the direction to get home.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we go the other way (laughs).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, great on the water, a little shifty on land. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, Beau, Beau, I'm grateful for you noticing all this stuff, but I'm taking point, so I mean--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'm behind you, and you're so short, so I can just see--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but you're just kind of making me look like an asshole a little.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My successes don't deter from you as a person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just feel like a failure, a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't compare yourself to me. It's an impossible task.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While they're having this conversation, Caleb, you're listening to this, but looking around your surroundings, and you can glance up, in that larger netted canopy of vines and branches that entwine and create these small tethered pathways, too thin perhaps for a heavier creature to traverse, but you glance up, and you can see a shadowed shape, pressed against one of the trees, chest curving around upon one of these, with these faintly glowing eyes, just peering down, straight at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do they seem like eyes as large as my own or something smaller than my own?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just saying, you should let me notice something every once in a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know anything about animals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just switching the street signs, yeah (laughs).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I'm just saying you can pull your own weight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, I noticed something in the trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say it that loud?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you're watching this thing, and, Caduceus, as you guys have traversed, you pick up on this thing, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But then you also both hear, and, Beauregard, you hear this, too, you hear the sound (thumps) of two sets of light feet hitting the ground from behind that tree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you saying that to the trees again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm saying it to anything that's listening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out a small, clay, pyramid-shaped statue that I have, with little glyphs and characters all over it, and I cast Tongues on myself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think that was a--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hope we can find somewhere to rest peacefully for the night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, no, that was always the goal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, Caleb, that's what we want to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You didn't have to like state that to us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (stilted) Yes, just a place to rest so nicely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know what you're getting into.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are just trying to get by.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So perhaps step out, and we could just discuss this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- this large black panther-like creature begins to emerge from the shadows, with these two additional lengthy tentacle-like appendages that curl.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you see a second one now, coming around from that initial growl sound.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And a third one begin to come from behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin to look amongst them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just slowly closing the circle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's got a big display, hmm? Something that looks big and loud and dangerous?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to pull them out and throw them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to light a firecracker and throw it, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (roaring, booming) Heavy footfalls getting louder and louder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we took care of the cat problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, let's fucking get in there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go, go, let's go, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The bear is carrying a weapon!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there two other displacer beasts now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and look, and they've scattered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are all preparing to engage in this, you can see the one displacer beast now lies limp on the ground, and these two hulking bipedal bears just kind of stand there (pants).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have just arrived, and we are strangers here, and you have just saved our lives, and we would like to repay the favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell them they're really cool looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as their bear form seems to shimmer for a second before it begins to shrink--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At least, it helped us get one kill."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you here for Traveler Con, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are you? "What are you doing here?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've been on the island for less than a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, welcome, welcome, we're happy to have you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you from the village we are aware of, further up the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you come to join us, as well?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long have you been a part of this village?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What about you?" (as woman) "A long time, a few years at least, I think."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And were you stranded, shipwrecked, on this island, and you all came together, or was it an intentional community that you started?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as man) "We've both been bears." And you can see the guy scratches this bite mark on his shoulder and goes, "Well, I mean, "I wasn't originally, but, you know, "some circumstance get out of hand."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where are you from, originally, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're asking these questions, they're both now starting to take the displacer beast and tie its legs up and find a local branch to get it ready for travel and bringing it back to the village.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You need any help? I can take that for you and carry it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was one of them hurt by the displacer beast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seemed you guys holding their attention gave them the chance to actually sneak up upon one and take it out without an issue.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, where were from, originally, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Um, "as for your question, I can't really recall, "but everything led to bringing me here, I think."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are your names again? I feel so bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And, Jaina, do you remember where you're from, out of curiosity?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are probing questions, Mr. Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (as Pono) "You see, the thing is, "a lot of us here have a hard time remembering."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which one of you ate the flowers?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was just a little bit, had, like, a little bit of a spice to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(laughs)" She punches you in the shoulder and is like, "You'll be fine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What could happen if you ate the flowers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What would happen if he ate the flowers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of points to Yasha, points to Caleb, "Don't eat the flowers." She goes and grabs the part of the stick as well, the center, where the displacer beast is picked up, and Pono is now pointing for you to grab the back half and be like, "Well, come on, come on, "you're helping, right? "You coming?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Climb the hill and see where you live?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And they begin trekking in the direction "where the now defaced marker would be pointing, "towards the village."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a leader of your village?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you not know, I mean, what found you here, "if you don't know about who we are?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, there's this god who's really awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you do know about this place?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who are you talking about? Oh god, are we going to have to fight a god to get to Traveler Con?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no, maybe they just call him a different name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What god are you talking about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they're still trudging through the forest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think you've seen his home," and points past a bit of the canopy where you can see the peak of a volcano itself, with the smoke--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did he make you a bear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no, no, no, this has been an affliction "that I've worked on most of my life, "got in a bit of a tussle with this boy, "but he's taking good care of it." And he's like, "Aye, you know they call it a curse, "but, thankfully, she knows her way around, "and it's helped me a bit."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would call it a blessing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it common in your village, or are you the only two who are dealing with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We left a ship, actually, on the southeastern part of the island.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Being chased by a giant dragon turtle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dragon turtle, that's not good at all."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have you?" (as Pono) "No, no, I haven't. Sounds bad."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you just built it up from the natural resources around you, out of the wildlife or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The folks who were here before me, "they told me that they've been building this "for quite some time, and then, one day, "I arrived, but they say it's always been here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How often do people come visit, out of curiosity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We usually get a few folks, every, "time's kind of a weird thing, "every few months, maybe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does anyone ever leave at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We find what we need here to survive, "and Vokodo provides what's necessary, "and we give back to Vokodo, "as part of that blessing cycle."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, what do you give to Vokodo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are deep mines, all across this island."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many-- How many of them are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is reminding me of something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't come over and give you a whisper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, text it to me, text it to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll just tell you, because it's easier right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll just pretend that we don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, they genuinely don't think that's the case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And does Vokodo have a shape, a form, a great beast, huge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But from what I hear, it's a great fiery beast, "an entity that resembles and encompasses the creation "of the world and its eventual destruction, "but here is its home, its nest, "and we care to it, "and as such, are given whatever we need."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you guys, do any of you in the tribe do, like, (breathing like "Midsommar") hoh-hah, ever? Is that something any of you ever do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's hoh-hah! Is that something that you guys do on the regular?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you group groan, do ya?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good, good to know, good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, we have, as a hunting group, underneath Terra, we have certain calls, to make sure we know where we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch as the elven woman, Jaina, goes and gives out this weird (sung tones) sound, this faint bird noise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'll learn how to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't hear any returning hunting parties, "so we're not close to any of the others under Terra."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I don't have my flute anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, maybe when we get there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gave the flute to his sister.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This great fiery beast, are the flames a certain color?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that one of the three leaders?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And then there is Viridian, "who is the spiritual leader, "and the one who "guides everyone "underneath the eye of Vokodo."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we'd love to be introduced to the rest of your village and then maybe we could talk to your three leaders about our plans, while guests here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, do you have any, like, big hotels or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're cutting down and making this place just grow "and swell with each new member."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you any memories of the mainland, outside of this island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And she looks over to Pono, and Pono goes, "The thing is, "when you come to "the center of the world, "the rest of it doesn't matter that much."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, sometimes, Cay-Cay, sometimes, people just don't want to remember some things, right, Caleb? I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but the center of the world seems like such a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we all think we're the center of our worlds, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all the center of our own world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And that is a true sign "of a blessed guided journey, is it not?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think the Traveler and Vokodo should definitely meet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, this Traveler's your god, you say?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they know each other, already.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe they do. I mean, you know, the Traveler gets around, so he's been here already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I bet Traveler knows about him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You mentioned an eye, the eye of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, just at night, the glowing sight," and you see she points to the top of the mountain and Pono gives another backup point and goes, "Yeah, when it's real dark at night, "sometimes you can see the glowing top of the mountain, "and that, we know, is Vokodo looking down over us "and keeping us safe."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm really excited to see that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, it could just be where the rock surface is thinned to the point of where the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't displace the magic of this moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You just shat on their religion, like, 30 second ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a history check, if you'd like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is indeed a symbol of the Clasp, which is a prominent thieves' guild, largely based out of Tal'Dorei to the far west of Wildemount.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb would know about it from the history, with a history check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that was your history check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we being poisoned by this mist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tal'Dorei is where the Clasp is based.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A far-off land that we're not from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're happy to answer any questions you guys have on the way, if you have any more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said there was a third leader.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, Terra. Terra is our hunting master, "the one that helps guide and organize us "to procure the meats and the "destruction of the dangerous creatures "and denizens of the land, "to give thanks for their bountiful gifts "of their own bodies, of which we use to feed our community."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you seem to be a part of the hunting party, is Terra also a bear person?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's one other lycanthrope on the island, "but they're more of the tiger variety."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We all get to mingle and see "who's going to show up next."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many of you are there, here, approximately?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd say we're close "to maybe, like-- where we at?" Pono's like, "Last count, "I think we were close to 70."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the three make decisions as a group, as a triumvirate, or is there one who's a prime of the three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I guess Viridian's the spiritual head of that."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And so if we were going to request a favor of your group, is there any advice you can give us, some gift that we could offer to sort of make ourselves in good favor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be nice, be helpful, show that you're useful "and part of the community."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And never leave, right? Haha, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course not, why would you? That would be weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But is your god, like, a vengeful god or a benevolent god, a relaxed and groovy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When you talk about making these sacrifices, giving these gifts to Vokodo, how do you do that? How do you give back the gems?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And these are gifted to the god, and as such, "Vokodo thus brings the blessing down upon us."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know where the doors are, though?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, you might have already answered this, but who decides what the offerings are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And then through Viridian, "the offers are brought, but as far as I know, "it's mostly just whatever we can find."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said there are some mines on the island, yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And Vokodo primarily likes gems and metals, precious metals and treasures?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beautiful from the earth, "things that are brought in, well-crafted."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, I bet Vokodo would like one of these! And I pull out a little Traveler dick statue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both go, "Oh, I bet they would!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right." Oh, and I'd say, at this point, you're getting-- we'll say you've traveled for a while, and you've bantered back and forth a bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some folks rush off to tell others, "New arrivals!" Some are saying, "We grow under his joy," and give a blessing symbol with their hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here, the tree itself is lush and tall, maybe 200 or more feet up, with numerous levels of branches, and each of these branches is like a hand where the vines have grown out to clutch another small homestead, and all of these themselves have connected vine bridges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am Lukash. Oh--" He turns, and you can see one of the vines lowering and unfurls, and standing on the vine as it descends--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm curious, "what is your tale? "Please, tell us." And that's where we'll end tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shit, we did it! We played the game, with a beginning, a middle, and an end!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like how during that whole description, Laura was like, "Ooh, this is creepy." You're organizing a cult!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A cult, yeah, cult v. cult.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So much less established than these people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is somewhere I've been looking forward to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, maybe I should be taking notes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! They've got their shit down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "We grow under his blessing," or some shit like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They have phrases. Come on, work on this stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I need to work on some phrases.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's-- dragon? He's a dragon. Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was thinking a dragon or maybe that purple phoenix that was at the beginning of the campaign, one of those three deities that's like--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or not the deities, like the other--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I was thinking that route.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's a purple fire or something like, blackish-purple.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she controlling the vines? Is that thing controlling the vines? Is the god controlling the vines?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you think if they're inhaling this mist-- we have, like, Lay on Hands, I could cure a disease or a poison and see if one of them snaps out of it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we spend the night here, and we wake up with--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we're all rolling saving throw, in the next morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's like the plane of Abyss, and the longer you're there, the more crazy you get.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long have these people been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The displacer beast encounter, that seems to have had nothing to do with that sense, that creeping sense that has just always been there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah yes, The Mighty Nein: Insulting people's gods since 2020.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, we'll pick up on there next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We did it! We played an episode! Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I missed you guys so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've been fighting getting emotional, all night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to sleep so hard after this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're so happy to see you.
